# Usage:
# $ wave_name
# num_ms_to_appear pos_y speed health

$ Wave_1
1000 540 1 3
5000 140 1 3
0 540 1 3
0 940 1 3
12000 740 2 3
0 340 2 3
5000 540 2 3
4000 140 2 3
0 540 2 3
0 940 2 3

$ Wave_2
1000 540 1 5
5000 140 1 5
0 540 1 5
0 940 1 5
12000 740 2 5
0 340 2 5
5000 540 2 5
4000 140 2 5
0 540 2 5
0 940 2 5

$ Wave_3
1000 540 3 6
3000 540 3 6
3000 400 3 6
0 680 3 6
